thread.section_title: My Phone Support Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of My Phone Support | www.myphonesupport.com
thread.title: Brenda Cunningham
thread.title_full: My Phone Support reviewed by Brenda Cunningham

author: Brenda Cunningham
title: Brenda Cunningham
text:
Umesh was very knowledgeable, personable, and efficient. He explained every step of the procedure of resetting my Outlook and resolving a few other issues.
I am grateful for Umesh's expedient assistance, knowledge, professionalism, pleasant demeanor. I would welcome his help any and every time I have pc issues.
I will wholeheartedly recommend your company to my family, friends, and business associates.
Once again, thank you!!!
Brenda Cunningham (a satisfied customer)
